article.headline: Robert Morris 81, Long Island U. 70
article.story: CORAOPOLIS, Pa. -- Rob Robinson scored 15 points and Jimmy Langhurst and Gary Wallace added 13 each to lead Robert Morris to an 81-70 victory over Long Island University on Saturday. Aurimas Adomaitis led Long Island (2-4) with 17 points, and Kyle Johnson and Michael Culpo each added 14 -- with 12 of Culpo's coming on three-pointers. The Blackbirds shot 6-of-21 overall from beyond the arc. Robert Morris made 8-of-16 three-pointers. Ron Manigault had eight rebounds for Long Island before fouling out. He had grabbed 10 or more boards in his previous three games. Julian Boyd also had 8 rebounds. The Colonials (4-4) led at halftime, 39-27. Robert Morris has now won four straight over the Blackbirds.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
